name: Radio Guidance
description:
Work as a park ranger to guide others out of the woods to the safety of their campfires. Synchronise with them over the radio and show them the way out.

A  game for the Brackeys 2022.2 Jam, themed "You are not alone".

Yes, the jam version is majorly incomplete. There are no animations, and some of the art is temporary. I've been moving houses, so I'm honestly surprised I uploaded anything at all. Hopefully you like what's there, and I'll try and update it following the jam.

Controls

WASD / Arrow Keys - move

E/Space - Send a radio signal

R - Restart Level

M - Mute Music

N - Mute Sound Effects

ESC - Quit

Credits

The game was created in its entirety by Andrew Stevenson.
